title: Perform Routine Property Inspection
description: A PM needs to perform a scheduled drive-by inspection of several single-family rentals to check for exterior maintenance issues.

tasks.description: Generate a list of properties due for their quarterly exterior inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of 10 property addresses.

tasks.description: At each property, check for visible lease violations (e.g., unkempt lawn, unauthorized structures, junk cars).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents the condition of each property's exterior using a mobile app.

tasks.description: If a violation is found at a property, issue a lease violation notice to the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies an overgrown lawn at one property and issues the appropriate notice.
